Why Hygiea MedGuard?

Enterprise-grade security meets seamless usability

End-to-End Encryption
Military-grade AES-256 encryption ensures your patient data remains completely private and secure.
Blockchain Integrity
Every record is immutably stored on blockchain, providing complete audit trails and tamper-proof verification.
Doctor-Controlled Access
Granular permission system allows patients to authorize specific doctors for limited time periods.

How It Works

Simple, secure, and seamless

01

Patient Onboards

Patient creates secure account and uploads medical records with encryption

02

Doctor Requests

Healthcare provider submits access request with credentials and purpose

03

Patient Authorizes

Patient reviews and grants time-limited access permissions

04

Secure Access

Doctor accesses records with full audit trail and blockchain verification
